item.description:
As we learn with Law Of Attraction, energy follows thoughts (& feelings) & you attract more of the same, whether you want it or not. Is this why some people attract so many partners & others are left lying in the dust? Do you want to be that compellingly attractive person but just don't know how to "attract" it? 

Kelle Sparta, Thought Alchemist of The Divining Room, will show you how to increase your attractiveness in this "play"-shop:

- What makes a man or woman attractive?

- Explore the dynamics of give & receive (not take)

- How to remove the blocks to openly receive

- What are you unconsciously telling potential "mates"?

About Kelle Sparta:
www.TheDiviningRoom.com
email: kelle@thediviningroom.com 

Kelle Sparta is a practicing shaman & tantrika with over 30 years of personal growth & development experience. She has been described as a “force of nature” & a “goddess incarnate”. Clients have referred to working with her as “entering the SpartaSphere – the place of multi-dimensional thought that opens doorways to new ways of being in the world.” She works with individuals & couples on both an energetic & practical level to find that place of strength & power within that allows you to have everything you ever wanted – in life, in love, & in community

******************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming. 

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

******************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft : 

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in 

(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Amping Up Your Attractiveness
